references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a foundational method for neural scene representation, which is heavily built upon in this paper.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper extends NeRF to handle unbounded scenes, which is a key advancement relevant to the paper's approach to reconstructing large-scale environments.
This paper presents a state-of-the-art method for neural surface reconstruction that is used as a baseline and comparison point in evaluating the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Ref-NeRF: Structured view-dependent appearance for neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper introduces a method to represent reflective surfaces in neural radiance fields, addressing a key challenge this paper aims to improve on.
This paper provides a large-scale dataset for multi-view stereopsis, which is used for training and evaluating the performance of the proposed method.
